body:
As the title suggests, I'm seeing a weird error message when I run any Spack command:

```
$ spack purge
'import site' failed; use -v for traceback
$ spack edit elk
'import site' failed; use -v for traceback
```

This usually happens after an install crashes, and it goes away as soon as I log out and log back in. Has anyone else seen this before?
title: 'import site' failed; use -v for traceback
